languages.text: "Еще из любопытного — тут недавно один забулдыга сокрушался, что по его вине с корабля вместе с мусором сбросили партию товара. Он это скрыл, а на Футфоле немедленно подался в бега. Оно и ясно — всплыви правда, его немедленно казнят. Не знаю, что там был за груз, но корабль, на котором он летал, обычно ходит между Футфолом и владениями Винтерскейлов. Пролетает через Перекресток Сотни Снов и Пояс Лангренна. Если будете в тех краях, можно поискать, что там этот дуралей выкинул за борт".

"Here's another titbit for you — some poor sot was here bawling about how his crew tossed out a whole shipment of cargo along with the trash, and it was his fault somehow. He hid the fact, and once they docked at Footfall, he immediately went on the run. No surprise there — had they discovered his blunder, he would've been executed. I don't know what sort of cargo it was, but the ship he served on usually goes between Footfall and Winterscale's Realm. She passes the Hundred Dreams Crossroads and Langrenn's Belt. If you happen by that area, you might want to look for whatever that idiot chucked overboard."
languages.original_text: "Еще из любопытного — тут недавно один забулдыга сокрушался, что по его вине с корабля вместе с мусором сбросили партию товара. Он это скрыл, а на Футфоле немедленно подался в бега. Оно и ясно — всплыви правда, его немедленно казнят. Не знаю, что там был за груз, но корабль, на котором он летал, обычно ходит между Футфолом и владениями Винтерскейлов. Пролетает через Перекресток Сотни Снов и Пояс Лангренна. languages.text: “还有另一个小道消息要告诉你。之前有个可怜的家伙在这里嚎啕大哭，说他在船上的同事把一整批货物当成垃圾扔掉了，还说这件事情实际上是他的责任。他没有和任何人说过这件事情，船刚一停在落脚港，他就立刻从船上逃跑了。这倒也不奇怪，要是船上的人发现是他犯了这种错误，他恐怕会被立刻处决。我不知道他说的是什么货物，不过他之前服役的那艘船，通常会在落脚港与温特斯凯尔星区之间往返，会经过百梦岔口与朗恩之带。如果你碰巧经过那片星区的话，说不定你可以找找那个白痴扔掉了什么东西。”
languages.original_text: "Here's another titbit for you — some poor sot was here bawling about how his crew tossed out a whole shipment of cargo along with the trash, and it was his fault somehow. He hid the fact, and once they docked at Footfall, he immediately went on the run. No surprise there — had they discovered his blunder, he would've been executed. I don't know what sort of cargo it was, but the ship he served on usually goes between Footfall and Winterscale's Realm. She passes the Hundred Dreams Crossroads and Langrenn's Belt. If you happen by that area, you might want to look for whatever that idiot chucked overboard."

languages.text: «Te voy a contar otro chisme: ha venido un borracho que se ha puesto a berrear diciendo que su tripulación había tirado un cargamento a la basura, pero la culpa fue suya de algún modo. Lo ocultó y, en cuanto atracaron en Paso, se dio a la fuga. Lo típico; si hubieran descubierto la farsa, lo habrían ejecutado. No sé qué clase de cargamento será, pero la nave a la que servía viaja normalmente de Paso a los dominios de Winterscale. Atraviesa la Encrucijada de los Cien Sueños y el Cinturón de Langrenn. Si pasas por allí, creo que te convendría buscar lo que sea que el idiota este haya tirado».
languages.original_text: "Here's another titbit for you — some poor sot was here bawling about how his crew tossed out a whole shipment of cargo along with the trash, and it was his fault somehow. He hid the fact, and once they docked at Footfall, he immediately went on the run. No surprise there — had they discovered his blunder, he would've been executed. I don't know what sort of cargo it was, but the ship he served on usually goes between Footfall and Winterscale's Realm. She passes the Hundred Dreams Crossroads and Langrenn's Belt. If you happen by that area, you might want to look for whatever that idiot chucked overboard."

Lo ocultó y, en cuanto atracaron en Paso, se dio a la fuga. Lo típico; si hubieran descubierto la farsa, lo habrían ejecutado. No sé qué clase de cargamento será, pero la nave a la que servía viaja normalmente de Paso a los dominios de Winterscale. Atraviesa la Enrucijada de los Cien Sueños y el Cinturón de Langrenn. Si pasas por allí, creo que te convendría buscar lo que sea que el idiota este haya tirado».

languages.text: 「もうひとつ、うまそうな話がある。どっかのクルーが、仲間が貨物をゴミと一緒に捨ててしまって、それも自分のせいだと泣きながら話していた。そいつはその事実を隠し、フットフォールに停泊するとすぐに逃げ出した。あいつの失態が発覚していたら、あいつは処刑されていただろうから無理もないね。どんな貨物だったかは知らないけど、あいつが乗っていた船はたいていフットフォールとウィンタースケールの領域の間を行き来していた。百夢の十字路とラングレンズベルトを通過することが多い。もしその辺りに立ち寄ったら、あのバカが投げ捨てたものを探してみるといいよ」
languages.original_text: "Here's another titbit for you — some poor sot was here bawling about how his crew tossed out a whole shipment of cargo along with the trash, and it was his fault somehow. He hid the fact, and once they docked at Footfall, he immediately went on the run. No surprise there — had they discovered his blunder, he would've been executed. I don't know what sort of cargo it was, but the ship he served on usually goes between Footfall and Winterscale's Realm. She passes the Hundred Dreams Crossroads and Langrenn's Belt. If you happen by that area, you might want to look for whatever that idiot chucked overboard."

traits.locale_text: 「もうひとつ、うまそうな話がある。どっかのクルーが、仲間が貨物をゴミと一緒に捨ててしまって、それも自分のせいだと泣きながら話していた。そいつはその事実を隠し、フットフォールに停泊するとすぐに逃げ出した。あいつの失態が発覚していたら、あいつは処刑されていただろうから無理もないね。どんな貨物だったかは知らないけど、あいつが乗っていた船はたいていフットフォールとウィンタースケールの領域の間を行き来していた。百夢の十字路とラングレンズベルトを通過することが多い。もしその辺りに立ち寄ったら、あのバカが投げ捨てたものを探してみるといいよ」

languages.text: "Ich habe noch etwas für Euch – irgendein armer Kerl hat hier erzählt, dass seine Crew zusammen mit dem Müll eine ganze Frachtladung abgeworfen hat und es wohl seine Schuld war. Er hat die Sache verheimlicht, und nach dem Anlegen auf Footfall hat er sofort das Weite gesucht. Das ist keine Überraschung – wäre sein Fehler aufgeflogen, hätte man ihn hingerichtet. Ich weiß nicht, was das für eine Fracht war, aber das fragliche Schiff pendelt üblicherweise zwischen Footfall und dem Winterzunder-Reich. Dabei passiert es den Knotenpunkt der hundert Träume und Langrenns Gürtel. Wenn Ihr dort zufällig mal seid, könnt Ihr ja nachsehen, was der Idiot über Bord geworfen hat."
languages.original_text: "Here's another titbit for you — some poor sot was here bawling about how his crew tossed out a whole shipment of cargo along with the trash, and it was his fault somehow. He hid the fact, and once they docked at Footfall, he immediately went on the run. No surprise there — had they discovered his blunder, he would've been executed. If you happen by that area, you might want to look for whatever that idiot chucked overboard."

languages.text: « J'ai un autre petit truc pour vous : il y a quelque temps, j'ai eu droit à un poivrot qui pleurait toutes les larmes de son corps parce que son équipage avait balancé toute une cargaison en même temps que les déchets, et que c'était de sa faute, d'une façon ou d'une autre. Il avait choisi de ne rien dire et de prendre la fuite dès leur arrivée à Castel, ce qui n'a rien de surprenant : si on avait découvert sa bourde, il se serait fait exécuter. Je ne sais pas de quel type de marchandises il s'agissait, mais le vaisseau en question fait généralement des allées et venues entre Castel et le Royaume de Winterscale, en passant par le Croisement des Cent rêves et la Ceinture de Langrenn. Si jamais vous passez par là, essayez peut-être de retrouver ce que ces crétins ont balancé. »
languages.original_text: "Here's another titbit for you — some poor sot was here bawling about how his crew tossed out a whole shipment of cargo along with the trash, and it was his fault somehow. He hid the fact, and once they docked at Footfall, he immediately went on the run. No surprise there — had they discovered his blunder, he would've been executed. I don't know what sort of cargo it was, but the ship he served on usually goes between Footfall and Winterscale's Realm. She passes the Hundred Dreams Crossroads and Langrenn's Belt. If you happen by that area, you might want to look for whatever that idiot chucked overboard."

Si jamais vous passez par là, essayez peut-être de retrouver ce que ces crétins ont balancé. »

languages.text: "Size enfes bir dedikodu daha. Zavallının teki oturmuş, iki gözü iki çeşme ağlıyordu. Mürettebatı çöple birlikte bir ambar dolusu kargoyu da yanlışlıkla gemiden atmış. Onun yüzündenmiş. Durumu çaktırmamış ve Binliman'a yanaştıklarında da hemen topuklayıvermiş. Ee, yaptığı büyük hatayı fark etseler adamı asarlar tabii. Nasıl bir kargoydu bilmem ama çalıştığı gemi, genelde Binliman ile Winterscale Diyarı arasında gider gelir. Yüz Rüya Kesişimi ile Langrenn Kuşağı'ndan geçer. O civara uğrarsanız bu salağın gemiden dışarı salladıklarını da ararsınız belki."
languages.original_text: "Here's another titbit for you — some poor sot was here bawling about how his crew tossed out a whole shipment of cargo along with the trash, and it was his fault somehow. He hid the fact, and once they docked at Footfall, he immediately went on the run. No surprise there — had they discovered his blunder, he would've been executed. I don't know what sort of cargo it was, but the ship he served on usually goes between Footfall and Winterscale's Realm. She passes the Hundred Dreams Crossroads and Langrenn's Belt. If you happen by that area, you might want to look for whatever that idiot chucked overboard."

traits.locale_text: "Güzel bir dedikodu daha duydum... Zavallının teki, mürettebatı çöple birlikte koca bir kargo yüklemesini de gemiden dışarı atmış diye oturmuş, iki gözü iki çeşme ağlıyordu. Onun suçuymuş tüm olanlar. Bu olanları saklamış ve Binliman'a yanaştıklarında hemen kaçıvermiş. Tabii buna şaşmamalı... Yaptığı büyük hatayı keşfetseler, adamı asarlardı. Nasıl bir kargoydu bilmiyorum ama çalıştığı gemi, genelde Binliman ile Winterscale Âlemi arasında gider gelir. Yüz Rüya Kesişimi ile Langrenn Kuşağı'ndan geçer. O civara uğrarsanız, bu salağın gemiden attıklarını aramak işinize gelebilir."
